title: Wayward

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Establish a connection between two players during the day.
- Intercept all players targeting one connected player and kill those players.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Connections do nothing.
- When you intercept, you will redirect all abilities targeting your target to the person they're connected to, and then deal a Powerful attack to everyone you redirected.
- When you intercept, your connection will be destroyed.
- You cannot intercept two nights in a row.
- You may establish connections between yourself. You cannot be killed by intercepting yourself.
- You can have up to three connections established at once.
